# [[separable]] [[verb]]

===Usage notes===
* a type of Chinese verb which consists of two parts. The two parts may go together, or other words may be placed between the two parts. For example: [[睡覺]] (''shuìjiào'', to sleep) vs. [[睡]][[午|<font color="green">'''午'''</font>]][[覺]] (''shuì wǔ jiào'', take a noon nap).

'''Examples of separable verbs:'''
* [[畢業]]
* [[創業]]
* [[革命]]
* [[鼓掌]]
* [[盡力]]
* [[參軍]]
* [[決口]]
* [[罷工]]
* [[閉幕]]
* [[保險]]
* [[報名]]
* [[貶值]]
* [[投資]]
* [[安心]]
* [[稱心]]
* [[洗澡]]
* [[如意]]
* [[睡覺]]
* [[游泳]]
